bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: ND4J and DL4J: CUDA test failures
bug.description:
Issues List (ND4J)
TFGraphTestAllLibnd4j TFGraphTestAllSameDiff TFGraphTestZooModels HeirarchicSoftmaxTests (passes when run in isolation) LapackTests.testCholeskyL, .testCholeskyU BERTGraphTest.testBert - https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/7523 BooleanIndexingTest.testEpsStuff_1 - passes in isolation, fails as part of full test suite - https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/cc1f88c8e794589a2848d2e3d4676927

comments.comment: WeightInitUtilTest.testXavierLegacy CompareTrainingImplementations.testCompareMlpTrainingIris both pass for me at this moment. please confirm you still can reproduce it.

Closing in favor of issue with more recent tests: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/7602>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/7602</denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
